Name: Network - Add SSL Certificate Binding
Description: Creates (replaces) an SSL certificate binding to a specific hostname and port using NETSH.
Author: timvaines

Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody:
$hostnameport = $OctopusParameters['HostnamePort']
$certhash = $OctopusParameters['CertHash']
$appid = $OctopusParameters['AppId']
$certstore = $OctopusParameters['CertStore']

$delcert = "http delete sslcert hostnameport=""$hostnameport"""
write-host "Removing Cert: $delcert"
$delcert | netsh | out-host

$addcert = "http add sslcert hostnameport=""$hostnameport"" certhash=""$certhash"" appid=""$appid"" certstore=$certstore"
write-host "Creating Certificate Binding: $addcert"
$addcert | netsh | out-host

Parameters.Name: HostnamePort
Parameters.Label: Hostname and Port
Parameters.HelpText: The hostname and port to bind to. Example: example.com:443

Parameters.Name: CertHash
Parameters.Label: Cert Hash
Parameters.HelpText: The certificate thumbprint (no spaces). Example: b087166a9f5cd6d75e5ba91105baa022658460de

Parameters.Name: AppId
Parameters.Label: App Id
Parameters.HelpText: The application identifier, can be any GUID value. Example: {06aabebd-3a91-4b80-8a15-adfd3c8a0b14}

Parameters.Name: CertStore
Parameters.Label: Certificate Store
Parameters.HelpText: The certificate store where the certificate lives. Example: My
